name: Last stand (johnath james the greatest)
description:
use ASDW to move

or use arrow keys to move

use left click to shoot

you can increase the size of your bullet by pressing z but it will cost you 1 health

when at 1 health your damage grows by a lot

this game is a heavily  modified version of a game i submitted  for juice jam as both jams started at the same time this game does not break any rules of MFGJ

assets used 

screen wrap script created by  Sunny Valley Studio -

came shake script  created by  brackeys -
